title: Dumbest Co-Op Bot?
body:
Having fast-leveled an account (this one) entirely using bot matches, and played my fair share of them for FWOTD or trying out champs, I'm rather familiar with the tendencies of each bot and some are, let's be honest, kinda... touched in the head. Which, though, would get your vote for dumbest?

For me, it's Ryze... **by far**. He initiates with his ult as if it were his old ult, just teleporting random places with it. He'll do the bronziest of tower dives on you for no apparent reason. No matter how far behind he is, he'll try and all-in you. He could be one auto away from dying, but still walk right into your range for some stupid reason. He can't combo worth a damn. It's like picking on a mentally deficient pre-schooler.

Who else do you think is worthy of consideration for the award?

replies.body: Soraka is exceptionally special and silly, just auto banana's you while you kill her, doesn't run away as long as you keep in range, it's so funny.

{{champion:33}} :he dives in your tower if he happens to start chasing you with powerball
{{champion:105}} :doesnt use any of its abilities unless allied bots are nearby
{{champion:41}} : .......
{{champion:75}} : 20 mins in...3 stacks
GP knows when and where to ult, at least.
Ryze. Ever since his rework he can't tell that he can't kill a 20/0 player under enemy tower.

Exactly. I'll be recalling under my turret with no mana and half HP and he'll tower dive me, maybe getting one auto on me, take a turret shot or two, walk away with a sliver of HP, and then get easily finished off by me. You can shepherd all of the bots away from lane to kill them when they become too scared to fight you anymore, but Ryze borderline intentionally feeds players, doing all the work for you.
Orianna bot just randomly ults for no reason in lane. I'd pick her
I've found she's either on point with her ult... or she ults air with you nowhere nearby. There's no inbetween. So she's kinda like me whenever I play Orianna.
I mean its bot for a reason

Did I not say that all bots can be taken advantage of easily? I'm just saying some are clearly a step above the rest in the stupidity category. Ryze Bot, for instance, seriously needs removed until they fix him. He's that braindead. At least other bots know how to use their ults, like Karthus Bot knowing when you're low enough to kill with his ult no matter if he has vision of you or not.
I feel like Ashe bot is the best (as far as killing people with arrows) and lux bot is the worst because she won't activate her E
But Lux bot is always on-point with her ult
